text: wqal almshrkwn: law sha' allah 'an nebdh wahdah ma eabadna ahdana ghyrh, la nahn wala abawuna min qblna, wala harramana shyyana lm yhrmh, bimithl hdha alaihtijaj albatil aihtaja alkufaar alsabqwn, wahum kadhbwn; fa'iina allah 'amrihim wnhahm wmkkanhm min alqiam bima kllafhm bh, wajaeal lahum quatan wmshyyt tasdur eanha afealhm, fahtjajhm bialqada' walqdr min abtl albatil min baed 'indhar alrusul lhm, falays ealaa alrusul almndhiryn lahum 'iilaa altabligh alwadih lamaa kullifu bh
